CustomField.formula: if (text(ucinn_ascendv2__Credit_Type__c) = 'Hard', if(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__c!= null, ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.FirstName + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.LastName, ucinn_ascendv2__Account__r.Name), if(ucinn_ascendv2__Hard_Credit_Recipient_Contact__c!=null, ucinn_ascendv2__Hard_Credit_Recipient_Contact__r.FirstName + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Hard_Credit_Recipient_Contact__r.LastName, ucinn_ascendv2__Hard_Credit_Recipient_Account__r.Name))
CustomField.label: Name of Hard Credit
